comments.body:
@TomAugspurger do you know if there is a difference taking flake8 from its own repo or from the pre-commit-hooks repo? 
In https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/issues/23616 you use the pre-commit-hooks one, but in a recent gitter chat you pasted the above?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +5,9 @@          - id: black
            language_version: python3.7
    - repo: https://gitlab.com/pycqa/flake8
      rev: 3.7.7
      hooks:
